previewArticle.title: FC Dallas vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: FC Dallas 3, Montreal Impact 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: FC Dallas vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Kellyn Acosta (FC Dallas).
Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay in match Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Abigail Aguillon
timelineItems.text: #dtid

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Montreal gets on the board first with Nyassi. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Mapp to Nyassi - it has been coming - terrific stuff from Justin and #IMFC deservedly up 1-0 on #FCD #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (10') | Sanna Nyassi abre la cuenta en Frisco, Texas para la visita tras un centro de Justin Mapp. #DALvMTL 0-1http://soc.cr/unZNs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL (10'): Nyassi turns in Justin Mapp's cross to give @impactmontreal a 1-0 lead: http://t.co/heJJ7rQ0gT #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: Nice work by Justin Mapp to get that to Nyassi for the easy finish, but how is Sanna not marked there? #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Quand Justin Mapp décide de faire confiance à son droit...

timelineItems.comment: Je-Vaughn Watson (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp just made Jair Benitez look old and Matt Hedges look slow. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Conner D'Amico
timelineItems.text: Back in Dallas for the weekend #fcdallas #mls #dtid #soccer #dallasshowcase

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Calderón
timelineItems.text: Bernardello has been such a good signing, launches attacks and defends decently. #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Goal! FC Dallas 1, Montreal Impact 1. Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Castillo collects a loose ball and drives it in

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: Bon, il est très, très, très, tôt. Mais l'Impact semble beaucoup mieux organisé, un meilleur placement. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Savard
timelineItems.text: J'aime bien le jeu de transition de l'impact #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jose Torres
timelineItems.text: Freezing our asses off at the #FCDallas #Soccer game

timelineItems.desc: Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW:  Farrari clips Perez from behind

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (16') | El colombiano Fabián Castillo empata el partido en Frisco tras un rebote en el área. #DALvMTL 1-1 http://t.co/KWRdZ3oYSS

timelineItems.comment: Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Gina
timelineItems.text: SUCK IT CANADA!!!! #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: oh well, that didn't take long. Where was our central defence? 1-1 #imfc

timelineItems.title: YELLOW:  Hernadez gets caught using a high elbow

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Gaillard
timelineItems.text: Bon, apparemment, dévier le ballon avec le bras, c'est autorisé en #MLS #IMFClive #BleuBlancNoir

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas).
Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: FC Dallas 
timelineItems.text: GOAAAAALLLL FC DALLAS! #FCDvMTL #DTID

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Offside, FC Dallas. Jair Benitez tries a through ball, but Fabian Castillo is caught offside.
Match ends, FC Dallas 3, Montreal Impact 2.

timelineItems.desc: The 2014 season gets underway as two teams, looking to improve on their 2013 campaigns, face off when FC Dallas play host to the Montreal Impact at Toyota Stadium in Frisco, TX.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: FC Dallas vs Montreal Impact | March 8, 2014

timelineItems.text: Can't decide if equalizer was poor marking or just bad luck. Probably a little of both. But you gotta expect better at back from #IMFC rite?

timelineItems.text: First match! #fcdallas

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Mauro Díaz.

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: I'm going to make a very late prediction here: @superraton7 will compete for the Golden Boot this year. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Ouf, gros trou dans la défense. Ni Nyassi, ni Brovsky du bon côté. 2-1 #FCDallas Perez sur penalty 24'

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Nick Synnott
timelineItems.text: That was definitely not a penalty, but the defence is so fragile... Scary! #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Je-Vaughn Watson (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: Donato De Chirico
timelineItems.text: #IMFC picking up where they left off last season

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: L'#IMFC qui reprend ses mauvaises habitudes défensives après le premier but de Dallas. #Klopas a du travail. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Sean Coleman
timelineItems.text: These replacement refs having a tough time to start in the #IMFC game. Brovsky call was really bad.

timelineItems.name: Mr. F
timelineItems.text: Wait, so #FCDallas got rid of the hoops? Sacrilege! #mls

timelineItems.name: Gianni Cristiano
timelineItems.text: #IMFC Pace is way to high for the firs 30 min. One of the teams will pay the price at the end of the game. Hopefully is not goung to be ours

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kellyn Acosta (FC Dallas) left footed shot from long range on the right is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Mauro Díaz.

timelineItems.name: Ludovick Martin
timelineItems.text: Felipe! Fallait la mettre dedans! #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Jair Benitez (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Michael Coirazza
timelineItems.text: Another good effort by Wenger to set up Felipe. So far still on my good graces.... But for how much longer? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: Hedges is starting to settle things down in the back. Good to see that. #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Ferrari looks a little to nonchalant tonight. Does he realize that this isn't a preseason game? #imfc

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: Weird seeing Felipe make the late runs into the box instead of Wenger. Not getting the strategy on that. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jair Benitez (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: #IMFC lacking communication & movement in the offensive half lately. Great pressure by Dallas. Need to breathe, move & talk!!! #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Mike G.W. Johnson
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas 'til I die son. #DTID

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact).
Kellyn Acosta (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: P.A. Birtz
timelineItems.text: Franchement pas terrible le maillot du #FCDallas #LaMinuteFashion

timelineItems.name: A.B.
timelineItems.text: Impression du moment pour #IMFC: poules pas de tête.

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: Have been a big fan of Jair Benitez since he came to MLS, but guy has shown his age last couple of years. Not starting well tonite. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Pour un jeune homme qui joue son 1er match en #MLS Miller est très impressionant dans toutes les phases du jeu #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Quand tu dis que ton meilleur défenseur dispute son premier match en carrière en MLS... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: Pretty impressed by what I've seen of Andrew Wenger so far tonight. Montreal could really use a breakout year from him. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Si Dallas joue toute la saison comme ses 5 premières minutes, il finira avec moins de points que DC United en 2012 #DALvMTL

timelineItems.text: Time for Wenger to show us why he was picked first! #IMFC

timelineItems.text: #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Carlos Camacho Jr
timelineItems.text:
Home Opener
Fc Dallas vs Montreal

#Frisco #ToyotaStadium #FcDallas

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Ah là là, voir le visage de Pareja avec FC Dallas, et non Colorado Rapids, écrit à côté. Ça me brise le coeur. Un si beau projet.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Matteo Ferrari agit comme capitaine ce soir #IMFC #MLS #BleuBlancNoir

timelineItems.name: Guillaume Perreault
timelineItems.text: À Andrew Wenger de prouver qu'il peut être partant à tous les matchs. Mon choix pour le 1er but de l'Impact. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two more about to kick off: #DALvMTL & #HOUvNE. Both on MLS LIVE. Follow: http://t.co/Q7XdRn8E34

timelineItems.name: Big D Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two seconds in and Acosta has already laid one of the Impact players out. #DALvMTL

timelineItems.name: AM
timelineItems.text: What a fantastic way to start the season... Sighs. Hope nyassi is okay #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Hunt
timelineItems.text: Were cool @golden_gloves_drew #fcdallas #westside #dtid #sick

timelineItems.text: Shallibaum serait déjà expulsé à cette heure… #IMFC

timelineItems.text: Incapable....le mot est incapable! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Rego
timelineItems.text: How did the impact not score there ? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Marc Chabot
timelineItems.text: Time is running up for #IMFC

timelineItems.name: James
timelineItems.text: That's what @Jon_Beard & I keep on asking. RT @justlikeneon86: WHY IS WATSON STILL HERE?! #FCDallas

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Collen Warner (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Justin Mapp.

timelineItems.name: Abdou Sall
timelineItems.text: Je sens le 3-3 qui s'en vient. Pas vous? #Optimiste #IMFClive

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Santiago González.

timelineItems.name: Steve
timelineItems.text: Wenger will be a stud in this league, hopefully for #IMFC. Love what I am seeing from him tonight #IMFClive

timelineItems.text: Voilà pourquoi Camara doit jouer latéral. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Camara can look so brilliant at times but then there are the costly mistakes that pop up now and then #HighRiskHighReward #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Blas Pérez.

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: All of these corners, and nothing to show for it. #imfc

timelineItems.desc: Goal! FC Dallas 0, Montreal Impact 1. Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Nyassi taps one in after the fancy Mapp cross

timelineItems.name: Hiba
timelineItems.text: Dammit Doctor Who! You've ruined me. All I can think is "count the shadows." #DALvMTL

timelineItems.text: Merci Perkins. J'avais presque un rythme cardiaque normal. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Ces deux défenses ont encore beaucoup, beaucoup de travail #DALvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: L'arbitre siffle n'importe quoi. Un mini contact et c'est faute. #IMFClive

timelineItems.text: But it was not to be...#IMFC

timelineItems.name: Alek Avendaño
timelineItems.text: Seulement le premier match, on a malheureusement beaucoup vu les défauts de l'Impact. Place a l'amélioration. #IMFC
